HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases Dyson products, particularly the 'hushjet Purifier Compact', and provides navigation to different product categories and support resources.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo in the top left corner, navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page for the featured product.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is present
The text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible
